reviews.text:
Perfect shopping and Dining experience

Indian store and good variety of restaurants and food courts

After few months of escalator maintenance Level2 to Level 3 ..it's working now. New shops and clothing stalls at level 1.  Clothes are really awesome and very budget prices.
It was three years ago that I was always shopping at this place, but a week ago I went for a medical check up only. Check it out what you need!!! üòÅüòÅ

Small neighbour mall which has many educational outlets- tuition, language, enrichment centers for children. Also has quite a good food court on ground floor n several other food outlets. Fast food - Mac‚Äôs n KFC are also available. Some other shops catering to usual household needs- Watson‚Äôs etc and there is an Ntuc outlet at the 3rd floor which is well stocked.

Everything is here. We used to go here for groceries. There's NTUC Fairprice and also Sir Murugan Market (indian store supermarket) which can provide you almost all of necessities you needed at home. Also got varieties of foods in Food junction and a lot of stores to eat. Got 3 bakeries in ground floor and few clinics on 2nd. Almost whole 3rd floor is NTUC so it was considered as a big one.
Selection of shops and businesses is decent. There is also plenty of food available. It is not crowded which makes shopping a pleasant experience.
